00450                         //Functionality for local functions
00451 
00452                         /* Type I local functions are functions that this molecule type needs to have
00453                          * always updated because it can react in a DOR reaction which needs the specified
00454                          * function.  DOR reactions identify these MoleculeTypes and add their function to
00455                          * the list of Type I functions for this MoleculeType.
00456                          *
00457                          * Type II local functions are those that require this MoleculeType as an observable
00458                          * or counter to be evaluated.  When this molecule gets updated, it has to automatically
00459                          * update all of its type II local functions.
00460                          *
00461                          * These functions return the index in the array indicating where these functions were
00462                          * added.  This allows local functions to quickly update molecules that need the local
00463                          * function information.
00464                          */
00465                         int addLocalFunc_TypeI(LocalFunction *lf);
00466                         int addLocalFunc_TypeII(LocalFunction *lf);
00467                         vector <LocalFunction *> locFuncs_typeI;
00468                         vector <LocalFunction *> locFuncs_typeII;
00469 
00470                         int getNumOfTypeIFunctions() const {return locFuncs_typeI.size(); };
00471                         LocalFunction *getTypeILocalFunction(int index) { return locFuncs_typeI.at(index); };
00472                         int getNumOfTypeIIFunctions() const {return locFuncs_typeII.size(); };
00473                         LocalFunction *getTypeIILocalFunction(int index) { return locFuncs_typeII.at(index); };
00474

00478                         int getDORrxnPosition(int dorRxnIndex) const { return reactionPositions.at(indexOfDORrxns.at(dorRxnIndex)); };

00752 
00753                         int getNumOfReactants() const { return n_reactants; };
00754 
00755                         string getName() const { return name; };
00756                         double getBaseRate() const { return baseRate; };
00757                         int getRxnType() const { return reactionType; };
00758 
00759                         void setBaseRate(double newBaseRate) {
00760                                 if(isDimerStyle) {
00761                                         this->baseRate=newBaseRate*0.5;
00762                                 }
00763                                 else this->baseRate=newBaseRate;
00764                                 update_a();
00765                         };
00766                         void setTraversalLimit(int limit) { this->traversalLimit = limit; };
00767 
00768                         double get_a() const { return a; };
00769                         virtual void printDetails() const;
00770                         void fire(double random_A_number);
00771 
00772                         //For DOR reactions
00773                         virtual void notifyRateFactorChange(Molecule * m, int reactantIndex, int rxnListIndex) = 0;
00774                         virtual int getDORreactantPosition() const { cerr<<"Trying to get DOR reactant Position from a reaction that is not of type DOR!"<<endl;
00775                         cerr<<"this is an internal error, and so I will quit."<<endl; exit(1); return -1; };
00776 
00777 
00778                         //The main virtual functions that must be implemented in all implementing classes
00779                         virtual void init() = 0; //called when the reaction is added to the system
00780                         virtual void prepareForSimulation() = 0; //called once everything is added to the system
00781                         virtual bool tryToAdd(Molecule *m, unsigned int reactantPos) = 0;

00796 
00797 
00798                         void turnOff_OnTheFlyObs() { onTheFlyObservables=false; };

01000 
01001 
01002                         void clear() { count=0; };
01003                         void straightAdd() {count++;};
01004 
01005                         /* methods used to get observable information */
01006                         unsigned long int getCount() const {return (unsigned long int) count;};
01007                         string getAliasName() const { return aliasName; };

01014 
01015 
01016                 protected:
01017                         string aliasName;   /* The name that will be output for this observable */
01018                         TemplateMolecule * templateMolecule; /* The template molecule which represents what we want to observe */
01019                         double count; /* the number of molecules that match this observable, its a double so that functions can use it (as a reference) */
01020 
01021                         vector <ReactionClass *> dependentRxns;/* signifies that some reaction's propensity depends on this observable */
